name: 坦克大战：共和国之辉
description: 即时制RPG坦克游戏《坦克大战：共和国之辉》复刻二战经典坦克，还原震撼战争画面，幻想式二战剧情，未来时空神秘战车，跨越历史，重燃战意，用铁血意志铸就不屈钢铁战魂。
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium（R）-Core E2210@2.20GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Integrated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I3 or better processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1G or 2G Dedicated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
